ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: Levering af ingeniørtjenester (teknisk tilsyn, ingeniør og koordinator af sundhed og sikkerhed på arbejdspladsen) til opførelse af ejendomme med flere lejligheder

Beschaffung von Ingenieurdienstleistungen (technische Aufsicht, Ingenieur und Dienstleistung für die Bereitstellung eines Koordinators für Sicherheit und Gesundheit am Arbeitsplatz) für den Bau von Wohngebäuden
Procurement of Services of Engineer (Technical Supervision, Engineer and Service of Providing a Coordinator for Safety and Health at Work) for Construction of Multi-Apartment Buildings
Contratación de servicios de ingeniero (supervisión técnica, ingeniero y servicio de provisión de un coordinador de salud y seguridad en el trabajo) para la construcción de edificios de apartamentos

Valvontainsinöörin palvelujen hankinta (tekninen valvonta, valvontainsinöörin työ sekä työturvallisuus ja -terveyskoordinaattorin palvelut) monta asuntoa käsittävien asuinrakennusten rakentamista varten

Les marchés publics de prestation de services d’ingénieur (supervision technique, ingénieur et services pour fournir un coordinateur pour la santé et la sécurité au travail) pour la construction de bâtiments de multi-appartements
Παροχή Υπηρεσιών Μηχανικού (Τεχνική Επίβλεψη, Μηχανικός και Υπηρεσία Παροχής Συντονιστή για την Ασφάλεια και την Υγεία στην Εργασία) όσον αφορά την Κατασκευή Πολυκατοικιών

Prestazione di servizi di ingegnere (supervisione tecnica, ingegnere e servizio di messa a disposizione di un coordinatore per la sicurezza e la salute sul lavoro) per la costruzione di edifici multi-appartamento
Verwerving van diensten van een ingenieur (technisch toezicht, ingenieur en dienstverlening van een coördinator op het gebied van veiligheid en gezondheid op het werk) voor de bouw van flatgebouwen

Adjudicação de serviços de engenheiro (supervisão técnica, engenheiro e serviço de fornecimento de um coordenador para a segurança e saúde no trabalho) para a construção de edifícios com vários apartamentos
Upphandling av ingenjörstjänster (teknisk övervakning, ingenjörstjänster och tjänster för tillhandahållande av en samordnare för hälsa och säkerhet på jobbet) för anläggning av flerfamiljshus
Zajištění inženýrských služeb (technického dohledu a inženýrských služeb pro zajištění koordinace v rámci bezpečnosti a ochrany zdraví při práci) při stavbě vícebytových budov
Korterelamute ehitamiseks projekteerimisteenuste (tehniline järelevalve, projekteerimine ja tööohutuse ja töötervishoiu koordinaatori pakkumise teenused) hange
Mérnöki szolgáltatások beszerzése (műszaki felügyelet, mérnök, valamint a munkahelyi biztonságért és egészségvédelemért felelős koordinátor biztosítása) többlakásos épületek építéséhez
Inžinieriaus paslaugų (techninės priežiūros, inžinieriaus bei darbuotojų saugos ir sveikatos koordinatoriaus) pirkimas daugiabučių namų statybai
Daudzdzīvokļu ēku būvniecībai paredzētu inženiera pakalpojumu (tehniskās uzraudzības, inženiera un darba aizsardzības koordinatora pakalpojumu) iepirkums

Ksib ta' Servizzi ta' Inġiniera (Sorveljanza Teknika, Inġinier u Servizz ta' Provvista ta' Koordinatur għas-Sigurtà u s-Saħħa fuq il-Post tax-Xogħol) għall-Kostruzzjoni ta' Binjiet b'Ħafna Appartamenti
Pozyskanie usług inżynieryjnych (nadzór techniczny, usługa inżynieryjna i usługa zapewnienia koordynatora ds. bezpieczeństwa i higieny pracy) przy budowie budynków wielorodzinnych
Obstarávanie služieb inžinierov (technický dohľad, inžinier a služba zabezpečovania koordinátora pre bezpečnosť a ochranu zdravia pri práci) pri výstavbe bytových domov
Naročilo storitev inženirja (tehnični nadzor, projektiranje in zagotovitev koordinatorja za varnost in zdravje pri delu) za izgradnjo večstanovanjskih stavb
Soláthar seirbhísí innealtóra (Maoirseacht theicniúil, Innealtóir agus seirbhís le comhordaitheoir a sholáthar um shábháilteacht agus sláinte ag an obair) d’fhoirgníocht na bhfoirgneamh ilárasán
Предоставяне на инженерни услуги (Технически надзор, инженер и услуги на координатор по здраве и безопасност на работа) за строителството на сгради с много апартаменти

Achiziționarea serviciilor unui inginer (supervizor tehnic, inginer și serviciul de asigurare a unui coordonator pentru sănătatea și securitatea la locul de muncă) pentru construirea de blocuri cu mai multe apartamente
Nabava usluga inženjera (tehnički nadzor, inženjer i usluga pružanja koordinatora za sigurnost i zdravlje na radu) za izgradnju višestambenih zgrada

CONTRACT PROCUREMENT NOTICE — International Open Procedure

TXT_MARK.P: Programme: Joint Regional Programme on Permanent Solutions for refugees and displaced persons (Regional Housing Programme — RHP) / Country Housing Programme of the Republic of Serbia.

Financing: Framework Agreement between the Council of Europe Development Bank and the Republic of Serbia in relation to the Regional Housing Programme signed on 25.10.2013 and Grant Agreement between the Council of Europe Development Bank and the Republic of Serbia in relation to the implementation of the 5th subproject of the Regional Housing Programme dated 14.8.2015.
“Jedinica za upravljanje projektima u javnom sektoru” d.o.o. Beograd

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Web address of the Contracting Authority:
Description of the subject of the procurement:

TXT_MARK.P: In the agreement on the implementation of the Regional Housing Programme in Serbia, the construction of the Multi Apartment Buildings is envisaged as one of the housing modalities (A1: Apartment Buildings) which is to be carried out in several implementation stages.
The mentioned housing modality defines collective housing in the apartments on the new locations and refers to the refugees wishing to integrate in the local communities as the users.

Scope of services implies provision of Engineer services on the construction of multiapartment buildings in the following municipalities: Malo Crniće (6 apartments), Niš (75 apartments), Svilajnac (15 apartments), Kruševac (40 apartments), Žabari (12 apartments), Požarevac (20 apartments), Loznica (60 apartments), Krupanj (5 apartments), Ub (20 apartments), Mionica (16 apartments), Temerin (64 apartments), Zrenjanin (40 apartments), Sremska Mitrovica (30 apartments), Novi Sad (276 apartments), Valjevo (20 apartments),Užice (10 apartments), Čajetina (12 apartments), Novi Pazar (20 apartments), Kikinda (16 apartments), Bački Petrovac (3 apartments), Bačka Palanka (16 apartments), Irig (13 apartments), Sremski Karlovci (16 apartments), Pančevo (8 apartments).

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Number of lots, if procurement is divided in lots:

TXT_MARK.P: — Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće i Požarevac,
— Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka,
Total estimated budget: 536 832 EUR VAT excluded.
— Lot 1: Niš — estimated budget 45 087 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 2: Kruševac — estimated budget 25 068 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — estimated budget 33 778 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 4: Loznica, Krupanj — estimated budget 39 138 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 5: Sremska Mitrovica — estimated budget 17 534 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — estimated budget 22 297 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 7: Temerin — estimated budget 37 638 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 8: Zrenjanin — estimated budget 24 786 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 9: Novi Sad — estimated budget 202 817 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — estimated budget 28 397 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 11: Novi Pazar — estimated budget 11 587 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — estimated budget 23 409 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — estimated budget 25 296 EUR VAT excluded.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Duration and type of framework contract (single supplier or multi-supplier framework contract) if framework contract is to be awarded:

TXT_MARK.P: Participation is open to all interested persons participating either individually or in a group (joint venture / consortium) who fulfil the following criteria as stated in the Volume 1, Section 1. Instructions to Tenderers, General part, Clause 3: Participation and CEB Guidelines for procurement of supplies, works and services, Section 3.3: Eligibility to participate in tenders and provide supplies, works and services.
Tenderers are obliged to fulfil the following criteria:
a) Liquidity: the Tenderer must not have had any registered blockage of their account in the twelve (12) months preceding the day of publishing the Contract Procurement Notice.
In case of consortium: This provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.
b) Bankruptcy and liquidation: Tenderer is not in the proceedings of bankruptcy or liquidation, i.e. the previous bankruptcy proceedings.
In case of consortium: this provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.

c) Operating income (in the event that the tender is submitted by an entrepreneur who keeps the books under the system of simple bookkeeping — income from business operations; in case the offer is submitted by a flat rate taxpayer — Activity income): Tenderer must have an average annual business revenue, during the previous 3 (three) accounting years (2014, 2015, 2016), not less than:
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — 50 667 EUR,
— for Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — 33 445,5 EUR,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 42 595,5 EUR,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 35 113,5 EUR,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 37 944 EUR,
— in euros at the middle exchange rate of the NBS on the last day of the reporting period.
If a Tenderer submits an offer for several lots, it must have an average operating income equal to the sum of the minimum business revenue for the lots for which the offer is submitted.
In case of consortium: 1 member of the consortium must fulfil at least 50% of the stated conditions.
2. Human resource capacity of the Tenderer:

a) The Tenderer must employ (on employment contract) at least below specified number of graduated engineers with a valid license issued by the Serbian Chamber of Engineers in case of submitting an offer:
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće i Požarevac — 4 persons,
— for Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — 2 persons,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 3 persons,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 3 persons,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 3 persons.
If a Tenderer submits the tender for several lots, it must show at least the sum of the minimum number of persons for the lots for which it is submitting a tender, being on employment contract.
In case of consortium: the criteria must be fulfilled by the consortium as a whole.
a) Experience in the provision of services:

That in the period from 1.1.2013 until the date of publication of the Contract Procurement Notice, had performed technical supervision services on the construction, reconstruction or upgrading of building structures* on the minimum of:
— for Lot 1: Niš — 5 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 2: Kruševac — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — 4 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 4: Loznica, Krupanj — 4 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 5: Sremska Mitrovica — 2 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 6: Ub, Mionica — 2 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 7: Temerin — 4 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 8: Zrenjanin — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 9: Novi Sad — total gross developed construction area 24.000 m2, on maximum 4 buildings,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 3 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 11: Novi Pazar — 1 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area.

If a Tenderer submits the tender for several lots, it must show, at least, the sum of required total gross developed construction area, in the period from 1.1.2013 until the publication date of the Contract Procurement Notice, for the lots for which it is submitting a tender.
In case of consortium: the criteria must be fulfilled by the consortium as a whole.
Name: Residential buildings with 2 or more apartments
Name: Residential building with 3 or more apartments
Name: Other buildings for short stay
Name: School buildings and scientific and research buildings
Name: Hospitals and other buildings for health care
* Building structures according to table defined in the Rulebook on classification of buildings, Official Gazette of RS, nº 22/2015
Selection procedure in the case of equal tender offers: In case of more Tenders with the same offered price the most favourable Tender shall be deemed the 1 with the longer Tender validity period.
In case of 2 Tenders with the same offered price and the same Tender validity period, the advantage is given to the Tenderer who offered a longer promissory note validity period.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Access to tender dossier, Internet address where Tender Dossier is made available
Address and web page of state, regional and local authority where information about taxes, environmental protection, employment and working conditions can be found:
Tender submission, deadline for submitting the tenders:

TXT_MARK.P: Tender should be submitted by registered post mail with acknowledgement of receipt or hand-delivered against receipt signed by Contracting Authority.
Tender should be submitted to the following address: Veljka Dugoševića 54, 5th floor — Registry office, 11000, Belgrade, Serbia.
If the tender is hand-delivered, address for submitting is: Veljka Dugoševića 54, 5th floor — Registry office, 11000, Belgrade, Serbia, in the period from 9:00 to 15:30.
Final deadline for submission of tenders is: 11.5.2018, until 10:00 am.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Tender opening session – date, time and place:

TXT_MARK.P: Tender opening shall be held at:
In the premises of Jedinica za upravlјanje projektima u javnom sektoru doo Beograd, Veljka Dugoševića 54, Belgrade.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Conditions for participation at the tender opening session:

TXT_MARK.P: Contracting Authority shall open the tenders publicly and tender opening session can be attended by any interested person, at time and place specified in this Procurement notice and Instructions to tenderers. In tender opening session, only the authorized tenderers' representatives can participate actively, in which case they are obliged to submit the authorization for attending and signing, as well as to sign the document by which they confirm their presence.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Deadline for delivering the decision on contract award:

TXT_MARK.P: 60 days upon the tender opening session at the latest.
Jedinica za upravlјanje projektima u javnom sektoru doo Beograd

Financing: Framework Agreement between the Council of Europe Development Bank and the Republic of Serbia in relation to the Regional Housing Programme signed on 25.10.2013 and Grant Agreement between the Council of Europe Development Bank and the Republic of Serbia in relation to the implementation of the 5th subproject of the Regional Housing Programme dated 14.8.2015.
“Jedinica za upravljanje projektima u javnom sektoru” d.o.o. Beograd

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Web address of the Contracting Authority:
Description of the subject of the procurement:

TXT_MARK.P: In the agreement on the implementation of the Regional Housing Programme in Serbia, the construction of the Multi Apartment Buildings is envisaged as one of the housing modalities (A1: Apartment Buildings) which is to be carried out in several implementation stages.
The mentioned housing modality defines collective housing in the apartments on the new locations and refers to the refugees wishing to integrate in the local communities as the users.

Scope of services implies provision of Engineer services on the construction of multiapartment buildings in the following municipalities: Malo Crniće (6 apartments), Niš (75 apartments), Svilajnac (15 apartments), Kruševac (40 apartments), Žabari (12 apartments), Požarevac (20 apartments), Loznica (60 apartments), Krupanj (5 apartments), Ub (20 apartments), Mionica (16 apartments), Temerin (64 apartments), Zrenjanin (40 apartments), Sremska Mitrovica (30 apartments), Novi Sad (276 apartments), Valjevo (20 apartments),Užice (10 apartments), Čajetina (12 apartments), Novi Pazar (20 apartments), Kikinda (16 apartments), Bački Petrovac (3 apartments), Bačka Palanka (16 apartments), Irig (13 apartments), Sremski Karlovci (16 apartments), Pančevo (8 apartments).

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Number of lots, if procurement is divided in lots:

TXT_MARK.P: — Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće i Požarevac,
— Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka,
Total estimated budget: 536 832 EUR VAT excluded.
— Lot 1: Niš — estimated budget 45 087 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 2: Kruševac — estimated budget 25 068 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — estimated budget 33 778 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 4: Loznica, Krupanj — estimated budget 39 138 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 5: Sremska Mitrovica — estimated budget 17 534 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — estimated budget 22 297 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 7: Temerin — estimated budget 37 638 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 8: Zrenjanin — estimated budget 24 786 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 9: Novi Sad — estimated budget 202 817 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — estimated budget 28 397 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 11: Novi Pazar — estimated budget 11 587 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — estimated budget 23 409 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — estimated budget 25 296 EUR VAT excluded.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Duration and type of framework contract (single supplier or multi-supplier framework contract) if framework contract is to be awarded:

TXT_MARK.P: Participation is open to all interested persons participating either individually or in a group (joint venture / consortium) who fulfil the following criteria as stated in the Volume 1, Section 1. Instructions to Tenderers, General part, Clause 3: Participation and CEB Guidelines for procurement of supplies, works and services, Section 3.3: Eligibility to participate in tenders and provide supplies, works and services.
Tenderers are obliged to fulfil the following criteria:
a) Liquidity: the Tenderer must not have had any registered blockage of their account in the twelve (12) months preceding the day of publishing the Contract Procurement Notice.
In case of consortium: This provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.
b) Bankruptcy and liquidation: Tenderer is not in the proceedings of bankruptcy or liquidation, i.e. the previous bankruptcy proceedings.
In case of consortium: this provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.

c) Operating income (in the event that the tender is submitted by an entrepreneur who keeps the books under the system of simple bookkeeping — income from business operations; in case the offer is submitted by a flat rate taxpayer — Activity income): Tenderer must have an average annual business revenue, during the previous 3 (three) accounting years (2014, 2015, 2016), not less than:
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — 50 667 EUR,
— for Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — 33 445,5 EUR,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 42 595,5 EUR,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 35 113,5 EUR,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 37 944 EUR,
— in euros at the middle exchange rate of the NBS on the last day of the reporting period.
If a Tenderer submits an offer for several lots, it must have an average operating income equal to the sum of the minimum business revenue for the lots for which the offer is submitted.
In case of consortium: 1 member of the consortium must fulfil at least 50% of the stated conditions.
2. Human resource capacity of the Tenderer:

a) The Tenderer must employ (on employment contract) at least below specified number of graduated engineers with a valid license issued by the Serbian Chamber of Engineers in case of submitting an offer:
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće i Požarevac — 4 persons,
— for Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — 2 persons,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 3 persons,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 3 persons,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 3 persons.
If a Tenderer submits the tender for several lots, it must show at least the sum of the minimum number of persons for the lots for which it is submitting a tender, being on employment contract.
In case of consortium: the criteria must be fulfilled by the consortium as a whole.
a) Experience in the provision of services:

That in the period from 1.1.2013 until the date of publication of the Contract Procurement Notice, had performed technical supervision services on the construction, reconstruction or upgrading of building structures* on the minimum of:
— for Lot 1: Niš — 5 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 2: Kruševac — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — 4 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 4: Loznica, Krupanj — 4 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 5: Sremska Mitrovica — 2 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 6: Ub, Mionica — 2 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 7: Temerin — 4 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 8: Zrenjanin — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 9: Novi Sad — total gross developed construction area 24.000 m2, on maximum 4 buildings,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 3 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 11: Novi Pazar — 1 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area.

If a Tenderer submits the tender for several lots, it must show, at least, the sum of required total gross developed construction area, in the period from 1.1.2013 until the publication date of the Contract Procurement Notice, for the lots for which it is submitting a tender.
In case of consortium: the criteria must be fulfilled by the consortium as a whole.
Name: Residential buildings with 2 or more apartments
Name: Residential building with 3 or more apartments
Name: Other buildings for short stay
Name: School buildings and scientific and research buildings
Name: Hospitals and other buildings for health care
* Building structures according to table defined in the Rulebook on classification of buildings, Official Gazette of RS, nº 22/2015
Selection procedure in the case of equal tender offers: In case of more Tenders with the same offered price the most favourable Tender shall be deemed the 1 with the longer Tender validity period.
In case of 2 Tenders with the same offered price and the same Tender validity period, the advantage is given to the Tenderer who offered a longer promissory note validity period.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Access to tender dossier, Internet address where Tender Dossier is made available
Address and web page of state, regional and local authority where information about taxes, environmental protection, employment and working conditions can be found:
Tender submission, deadline for submitting the tenders:

TXT_MARK.P: Tender should be submitted by registered post mail with acknowledgement of receipt or hand-delivered against receipt signed by Contracting Authority.
Tender should be submitted to the following address: Veljka Dugoševića 54, 5th floor — Registry office, 11000, Belgrade, Serbia.
If the tender is hand-delivered, address for submitting is: Veljka Dugoševića 54, 5th floor — Registry office, 11000, Belgrade, Serbia, in the period from 9:00 to 15:30.
Final deadline for submission of tenders is: 11.5.2018, until 10:00 am.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Tender opening session – date, time and place:

TXT_MARK.P: Tender opening shall be held at:
In the premises of Jedinica za upravlјanje projektima u javnom sektoru doo Beograd, Veljka Dugoševića 54, Belgrade.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Conditions for participation at the tender opening session:

TXT_MARK.P: Contracting Authority shall open the tenders publicly and tender opening session can be attended by any interested person, at time and place specified in this Procurement notice and Instructions to tenderers. In tender opening session, only the authorized tenderers' representatives can participate actively, in which case they are obliged to submit the authorization for attending and signing, as well as to sign the document by which they confirm their presence.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Deadline for delivering the decision on contract award:

TXT_MARK.P: 60 days upon the tender opening session at the latest.
Jedinica za upravlјanje projektima u javnom sektoru doo Beograd

TXT_MARK.P: In the agreement on the implementation of the Regional Housing Programme in Serbia, the construction of the Multi Apartment Buildings is envisaged as one of the housing modalities (A1: Apartment Buildings) which is to be carried out in several implementation stages.

Tenderers are obliged to fulfil the following criteria:
a) Liquidity: the Tenderer must not have had any registered blockage of their account in the twelve (12) months preceding the day of publishing the Contract Procurement Notice.
In case of consortium: This provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.
b) Bankruptcy and liquidation: Tenderer is not in the proceedings of bankruptcy or liquidation, i.e. the previous bankruptcy proceedings.
In case of consortium: this provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.

c) Operating income (in the event that the tender is submitted by an entrepreneur who keeps the books under the system of simple bookkeeping — income from business operations; in case the offer is submitted by a flat rate taxpayer — Activity income): Tenderer must have an average annual business revenue, during the previous 3 (three) accounting years (2014, 2015, 2016), not less than:

If a Tenderer submits an offer for several lots, it must have an average operating income equal to the sum of the minimum business revenue for the lots for which the offer is submitted.
In case of consortium: 1 member of the consortium must fulfil at least 50% of the stated conditions.

TXT_MARK.P: Participation is open to all interested persons participating either individually or in a group (joint venture / consortium) who fulfil the following criteria as stated in the Volume 1, Section 1. Instructions to Tenderers, General part, Clause 3: Participation and CEB Guidelines for procurement of supplies, works and services, Section 3.3: Eligibility to participate in tenders and provide supplies, works and services.
Tenderers are obliged to fulfil the following criteria:
a) Liquidity: the Tenderer must not have had any registered blockage of their account in the twelve (12) months preceding the day of publishing the Contract Procurement Notice.
In case of consortium: This provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.
b) Bankruptcy and liquidation: Tenderer is not in the proceedings of bankruptcy or liquidation, i.e. the previous bankruptcy proceedings.
In case of consortium: this provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.

c) Operating income (in the event that the tender is submitted by an entrepreneur who keeps the books under the system of simple bookkeeping — income from business operations; in case the offer is submitted by a flat rate taxpayer — Activity income): Tenderer must have an average annual business revenue, during the previous 3 (three) accounting years (2014, 2015, 2016), not less than:
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — 50 667 EUR,
— for Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — 33 445,5 EUR,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 42 595,5 EUR,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 35 113,5 EUR,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 37 944 EUR,
— in euros at the middle exchange rate of the NBS on the last day of the reporting period.
If a Tenderer submits an offer for several lots, it must have an average operating income equal to the sum of the minimum business revenue for the lots for which the offer is submitted.
In case of consortium: 1 member of the consortium must fulfil at least 50% of the stated conditions.

a) The Tenderer must employ (on employment contract) at least below specified number of graduated engineers with a valid license issued by the Serbian Chamber of Engineers in case of submitting an offer:

— for Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — 2 persons,

In case of consortium: the criteria must be fulfilled by the consortium as a whole.

That in the period from 1.1.2013 until the date of publication of the Contract Procurement Notice, had performed technical supervision services on the construction, reconstruction or upgrading of building structures* on the minimum of:

If a Tenderer submits the tender for several lots, it must show, at least, the sum of required total gross developed construction area, in the period from 1.1.2013 until the publication date of the Contract Procurement Notice, for the lots for which it is submitting a tender.

TXT_MARK.P: In the agreement on the implementation of the Regional Housing Programme in Serbia, the construction of the Multi Apartment Buildings is envisaged as one of the housing modalities (A1: Apartment Buildings) which is to be carried out in several implementation stages.

TXT_MARK.P: Programme: Joint Regional Programme on Permanent Solutions for refugees and displaced persons (Regional Housing Programme — RHP) / Country Housing Programme of the Republic of Serbia.

Financing: Framework Agreement between the Council of Europe Development Bank and the Republic of Serbia in relation to the Regional Housing Programme signed on 25.10.2013 and Grant Agreement between the Council of Europe Development Bank and the Republic of Serbia in relation to the implementation of the 5th subproject of the Regional Housing Programme dated 14.8.2015.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Web address of the Contracting Authority:
Description of the subject of the procurement:

TXT_MARK.P: In the agreement on the implementation of the Regional Housing Programme in Serbia, the construction of the Multi Apartment Buildings is envisaged as one of the housing modalities (A1: Apartment Buildings) which is to be carried out in several implementation stages.
The mentioned housing modality defines collective housing in the apartments on the new locations and refers to the refugees wishing to integrate in the local communities as the users.

Scope of services implies provision of Engineer services on the construction of multiapartment buildings in the following municipalities: Malo Crniće (6 apartments), Niš (75 apartments), Svilajnac (15 apartments), Kruševac (40 apartments), Žabari (12 apartments), Požarevac (20 apartments), Loznica (60 apartments), Krupanj (5 apartments), Ub (20 apartments), Mionica (16 apartments), Temerin (64 apartments), Zrenjanin (40 apartments), Sremska Mitrovica (30 apartments), Novi Sad (276 apartments), Valjevo (20 apartments),Užice (10 apartments), Čajetina (12 apartments), Novi Pazar (20 apartments), Kikinda (16 apartments), Bački Petrovac (3 apartments), Bačka Palanka (16 apartments), Irig (13 apartments), Sremski Karlovci (16 apartments), Pančevo (8 apartments).

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Number of lots, if procurement is divided in lots:

TXT_MARK.P: — Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće i Požarevac,
— Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka,
Total estimated budget: 536 832 EUR VAT excluded.
— Lot 1: Niš — estimated budget 45 087 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 2: Kruševac — estimated budget 25 068 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — estimated budget 33 778 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 4: Loznica, Krupanj — estimated budget 39 138 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 5: Sremska Mitrovica — estimated budget 17 534 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — estimated budget 22 297 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 7: Temerin — estimated budget 37 638 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 8: Zrenjanin — estimated budget 24 786 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 9: Novi Sad — estimated budget 202 817 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — estimated budget 28 397 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 11: Novi Pazar — estimated budget 11 587 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — estimated budget 23 409 EUR VAT excluded,
— Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — estimated budget 25 296 EUR VAT excluded.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Duration and type of framework contract (single supplier or multi-supplier framework contract) if framework contract is to be awarded:

TXT_MARK.P: Participation is open to all interested persons participating either individually or in a group (joint venture / consortium) who fulfil the following criteria as stated in the Volume 1, Section 1. Instructions to Tenderers, General part, Clause 3: Participation and CEB Guidelines for procurement of supplies, works and services, Section 3.3: Eligibility to participate in tenders and provide supplies, works and services.
Tenderers are obliged to fulfil the following criteria:
a) Liquidity: the Tenderer must not have had any registered blockage of their account in the twelve (12) months preceding the day of publishing the Contract Procurement Notice.
In case of consortium: This provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.
b) Bankruptcy and liquidation: Tenderer is not in the proceedings of bankruptcy or liquidation, i.e. the previous bankruptcy proceedings.
In case of consortium: this provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.

c) Operating income (in the event that the tender is submitted by an entrepreneur who keeps the books under the system of simple bookkeeping — income from business operations; in case the offer is submitted by a flat rate taxpayer — Activity income): Tenderer must have an average annual business revenue, during the previous 3 (three) accounting years (2014, 2015, 2016), not less than:
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — 50 667 EUR,
— for Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — 33 445,5 EUR,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 42 595,5 EUR,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 35 113,5 EUR,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 37 944 EUR,
— in euros at the middle exchange rate of the NBS on the last day of the reporting period.
If a Tenderer submits an offer for several lots, it must have an average operating income equal to the sum of the minimum business revenue for the lots for which the offer is submitted.
In case of consortium: 1 member of the consortium must fulfil at least 50% of the stated conditions.
2. Human resource capacity of the Tenderer:

a) The Tenderer must employ (on employment contract) at least below specified number of graduated engineers with a valid license issued by the Serbian Chamber of Engineers in case of submitting an offer:
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće i Požarevac — 4 persons,
— for Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — 2 persons,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 3 persons,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 3 persons,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 3 persons.
If a Tenderer submits the tender for several lots, it must show at least the sum of the minimum number of persons for the lots for which it is submitting a tender, being on employment contract.
In case of consortium: the criteria must be fulfilled by the consortium as a whole.
a) Experience in the provision of services:

That in the period from 1.1.2013 until the date of publication of the Contract Procurement Notice, had performed technical supervision services on the construction, reconstruction or upgrading of building structures* on the minimum of:
— for Lot 1: Niš — 5 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 2: Kruševac — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — 4 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 4: Loznica, Krupanj — 4 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 5: Sremska Mitrovica — 2 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 6: Ub, Mionica — 2 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 7: Temerin — 4 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 8: Zrenjanin — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 9: Novi Sad — total gross developed construction area 24.000 m2, on maximum 4 buildings,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 3 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 11: Novi Pazar — 1 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area.

If a Tenderer submits the tender for several lots, it must show, at least, the sum of required total gross developed construction area, in the period from 1.1.2013 until the publication date of the Contract Procurement Notice, for the lots for which it is submitting a tender.
In case of consortium: the criteria must be fulfilled by the consortium as a whole.
Name: Residential buildings with 2 or more apartments
Name: Residential building with 3 or more apartments
Name: Other buildings for short stay
Name: School buildings and scientific and research buildings
Name: Hospitals and other buildings for health care
* Building structures according to table defined in the Rulebook on classification of buildings, Official Gazette of RS, nº 22/2015
Selection procedure in the case of equal tender offers: In case of more Tenders with the same offered price the most favourable Tender shall be deemed the 1 with the longer Tender validity period.
In case of 2 Tenders with the same offered price and the same Tender validity period, the advantage is given to the Tenderer who offered a longer promissory note validity period.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Access to tender dossier, Internet address where Tender Dossier is made available
Address and web page of state, regional and local authority where information about taxes, environmental protection, employment and working conditions can be found:
Tender submission, deadline for submitting the tenders:

TXT_MARK.P: Tender should be submitted by registered post mail with acknowledgement of receipt or hand-delivered against receipt signed by Contracting Authority.
Tender should be submitted to the following address: Veljka Dugoševića 54, 5th floor — Registry office, 11000, Belgrade, Serbia.
If the tender is hand-delivered, address for submitting is: Veljka Dugoševića 54, 5th floor — Registry office, 11000, Belgrade, Serbia, in the period from 9:00 to 15:30.
Final deadline for submission of tenders is: 11.5.2018, until 10:00 am.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Tender opening session – date, time and place:

TXT_MARK.P: Tender opening shall be held at:
In the premises of Jedinica za upravlјanje projektima u javnom sektoru doo Beograd, Veljka Dugoševića 54, Belgrade.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Conditions for participation at the tender opening session:

TXT_MARK.P: Contracting Authority shall open the tenders publicly and tender opening session can be attended by any interested person, at time and place specified in this Procurement notice and Instructions to tenderers. In tender opening session, only the authorized tenderers' representatives can participate actively, in which case they are obliged to submit the authorization for attending and signing, as well as to sign the document by which they confirm their presence.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Deadline for delivering the decision on contract award:

TXT_MARK.P: 60 days upon the tender opening session at the latest.

Description of the subject of the procurement:

TXT_MARK.P: In the agreement on the implementation of the Regional Housing Programme in Serbia, the construction of the Multi Apartment Buildings is envisaged as one of the housing modalities (A1: Apartment Buildings) which is to be carried out in several implementation stages.
The mentioned housing modality defines collective housing in the apartments on the new locations and refers to the refugees wishing to integrate in the local communities as the users.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Duration and type of framework contract (single supplier or multi-supplier framework contract) if framework contract is to be awarded:

TXT_MARK.P: Participation is open to all interested persons participating either individually or in a group (joint venture / consortium) who fulfil the following criteria as stated in the Volume 1, Section 1. Instructions to Tenderers, General part, Clause 3: Participation and CEB Guidelines for procurement of supplies, works and services, Section 3.3: Eligibility to participate in tenders and provide supplies, works and services.
Tenderers are obliged to fulfil the following criteria:
a) Liquidity: the Tenderer must not have had any registered blockage of their account in the twelve (12) months preceding the day of publishing the Contract Procurement Notice.
In case of consortium: This provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.
b) Bankruptcy and liquidation: Tenderer is not in the proceedings of bankruptcy or liquidation, i.e. the previous bankruptcy proceedings.
In case of consortium: this provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.

c) Operating income (in the event that the tender is submitted by an entrepreneur who keeps the books under the system of simple bookkeeping — income from business operations; in case the offer is submitted by a flat rate taxpayer — Activity income): Tenderer must have an average annual business revenue, during the previous 3 (three) accounting years (2014, 2015, 2016), not less than:
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — 50 667 EUR,
— for Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — 33 445,5 EUR,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 42 595,5 EUR,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 35 113,5 EUR,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 37 944 EUR,
— in euros at the middle exchange rate of the NBS on the last day of the reporting period.
If a Tenderer submits an offer for several lots, it must have an average operating income equal to the sum of the minimum business revenue for the lots for which the offer is submitted.
In case of consortium: 1 member of the consortium must fulfil at least 50% of the stated conditions.
2. Human resource capacity of the Tenderer:

a) The Tenderer must employ (on employment contract) at least below specified number of graduated engineers with a valid license issued by the Serbian Chamber of Engineers in case of submitting an offer:
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće i Požarevac — 4 persons,
— for Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — 2 persons,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 3 persons,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 3 persons,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 3 persons.
If a Tenderer submits the tender for several lots, it must show at least the sum of the minimum number of persons for the lots for which it is submitting a tender, being on employment contract.
In case of consortium: the criteria must be fulfilled by the consortium as a whole.
a) Experience in the provision of services:

That in the period from 1.1.2013 until the date of publication of the Contract Procurement Notice, had performed technical supervision services on the construction, reconstruction or upgrading of building structures* on the minimum of:
— for Lot 1: Niš — 5 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 2: Kruševac — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — 4 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 4: Loznica, Krupanj — 4 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 5: Sremska Mitrovica — 2 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 6: Ub, Mionica — 2 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 7: Temerin — 4 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 8: Zrenjanin — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 9: Novi Sad — total gross developed construction area 24.000 m2, on maximum 4 buildings,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 3 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 11: Novi Pazar — 1 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area.

If a Tenderer submits the tender for several lots, it must show, at least, the sum of required total gross developed construction area, in the period from 1.1.2013 until the publication date of the Contract Procurement Notice, for the lots for which it is submitting a tender.
In case of consortium: the criteria must be fulfilled by the consortium as a whole.
Name: Residential buildings with 2 or more apartments
Name: Residential building with 3 or more apartments
Name: Other buildings for short stay
Name: School buildings and scientific and research buildings
Name: Hospitals and other buildings for health care
* Building structures according to table defined in the Rulebook on classification of buildings, Official Gazette of RS, nº 22/2015
Selection procedure in the case of equal tender offers: In case of more Tenders with the same offered price the most favourable Tender shall be deemed the 1 with the longer Tender validity period.
In case of 2 Tenders with the same offered price and the same Tender validity period, the advantage is given to the Tenderer who offered a longer promissory note validity period.

Description of the subject of the procurement:

TXT_MARK.P: In the agreement on the implementation of the Regional Housing Programme in Serbia, the construction of the Multi Apartment Buildings is envisaged as one of the housing modalities (A1: Apartment Buildings) which is to be carried out in several implementation stages.
The mentioned housing modality defines collective housing in the apartments on the new locations and refers to the refugees wishing to integrate in the local communities as the users.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Web address of the Contracting Authority:
Description of the subject of the procurement:

TXT_MARK.P: In the agreement on the implementation of the Regional Housing Programme in Serbia, the construction of the Multi Apartment Buildings is envisaged as one of the housing modalities (A1: Apartment Buildings) which is to be carried out in several implementation stages.
The mentioned housing modality defines collective housing in the apartments on the new locations and refers to the refugees wishing to integrate in the local communities as the users.

Scope of services implies provision of Engineer services on the construction of multiapartment buildings in the following municipalities: Malo Crniće (6 apartments), Niš (75 apartments), Svilajnac (15 apartments), Kruševac (40 apartments), Žabari (12 apartments), Požarevac (20 apartments), Loznica (60 apartments), Krupanj (5 apartments), Ub (20 apartments), Mionica (16 apartments), Temerin (64 apartments), Zrenjanin (40 apartments), Sremska Mitrovica (30 apartments), Novi Sad (276 apartments), Valjevo (20 apartments),Užice (10 apartments), Čajetina (12 apartments), Novi Pazar (20 apartments), Kikinda (16 apartments), Bački Petrovac (3 apartments), Bačka Palanka (16 apartments), Irig (13 apartments), Sremski Karlovci (16 apartments), Pančevo (8 apartments).

— Lot 11: Novi Pazar — estimated budget 11 587 EUR VAT excluded,

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Duration and type of framework contract (single supplier or multi-supplier framework contract) if framework contract is to be awarded:

TXT_MARK.P: Participation is open to all interested persons participating either individually or in a group (joint venture / consortium) who fulfil the following criteria as stated in the Volume 1, Section 1. Instructions to Tenderers, General part, Clause 3: Participation and CEB Guidelines for procurement of supplies, works and services, Section 3.3: Eligibility to participate in tenders and provide supplies, works and services.
Tenderers are obliged to fulfil the following criteria:
a) Liquidity: the Tenderer must not have had any registered blockage of their account in the twelve (12) months preceding the day of publishing the Contract Procurement Notice.
In case of consortium: This provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.
b) Bankruptcy and liquidation: Tenderer is not in the proceedings of bankruptcy or liquidation, i.e. the previous bankruptcy proceedings.
In case of consortium: this provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.

c) Operating income (in the event that the tender is submitted by an entrepreneur who keeps the books under the system of simple bookkeeping — income from business operations; in case the offer is submitted by a flat rate taxpayer — Activity income): Tenderer must have an average annual business revenue, during the previous 3 (three) accounting years (2014, 2015, 2016), not less than:
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — 50 667 EUR,
— for Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — 33 445,5 EUR,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 42 595,5 EUR,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 35 113,5 EUR,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 37 944 EUR,
— in euros at the middle exchange rate of the NBS on the last day of the reporting period.
If a Tenderer submits an offer for several lots, it must have an average operating income equal to the sum of the minimum business revenue for the lots for which the offer is submitted.
In case of consortium: 1 member of the consortium must fulfil at least 50% of the stated conditions.
2. Human resource capacity of the Tenderer:

a) The Tenderer must employ (on employment contract) at least below specified number of graduated engineers with a valid license issued by the Serbian Chamber of Engineers in case of submitting an offer:
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće i Požarevac — 4 persons,
— for Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — 2 persons,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 3 persons,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 3 persons,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 3 persons.
If a Tenderer submits the tender for several lots, it must show at least the sum of the minimum number of persons for the lots for which it is submitting a tender, being on employment contract.
In case of consortium: the criteria must be fulfilled by the consortium as a whole.
a) Experience in the provision of services:

That in the period from 1.1.2013 until the date of publication of the Contract Procurement Notice, had performed technical supervision services on the construction, reconstruction or upgrading of building structures* on the minimum of:
— for Lot 1: Niš — 5 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 2: Kruševac — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — 4 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 4: Loznica, Krupanj — 4 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 5: Sremska Mitrovica — 2 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 6: Ub, Mionica — 2 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 7: Temerin — 4 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 8: Zrenjanin — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 9: Novi Sad — total gross developed construction area 24.000 m2, on maximum 4 buildings,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 3 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 11: Novi Pazar — 1 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area.

If a Tenderer submits the tender for several lots, it must show, at least, the sum of required total gross developed construction area, in the period from 1.1.2013 until the publication date of the Contract Procurement Notice, for the lots for which it is submitting a tender.
In case of consortium: the criteria must be fulfilled by the consortium as a whole.
Name: Residential buildings with 2 or more apartments
Name: Residential building with 3 or more apartments
Name: Other buildings for short stay
Name: School buildings and scientific and research buildings
Name: Hospitals and other buildings for health care
* Building structures according to table defined in the Rulebook on classification of buildings, Official Gazette of RS, nº 22/2015
Selection procedure in the case of equal tender offers: In case of more Tenders with the same offered price the most favourable Tender shall be deemed the 1 with the longer Tender validity period.
In case of 2 Tenders with the same offered price and the same Tender validity period, the advantage is given to the Tenderer who offered a longer promissory note validity period.

Scope of services implies provision of Engineer services on the construction of multiapartment buildings in the following municipalities: Malo Crniće (6 apartments), Niš (75 apartments), Svilajnac (15 apartments), Kruševac (40 apartments), Žabari (12 apartments), Požarevac (20 apartments), Loznica (60 apartments), Krupanj (5 apartments), Ub (20 apartments), Mionica (16 apartments), Temerin (64 apartments), Zrenjanin (40 apartments), Sremska Mitrovica (30 apartments), Novi Sad (276 apartments), Valjevo (20 apartments),Užice (10 apartments), Čajetina (12 apartments), Novi Pazar (20 apartments), Kikinda (16 apartments), Bački Petrovac (3 apartments), Bačka Palanka (16 apartments), Irig (13 apartments), Sremski Karlovci (16 apartments), Pančevo (8 apartments).

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Duration and type of framework contract (single supplier or multi-supplier framework contract) if framework contract is to be awarded:

TXT_MARK.P: Participation is open to all interested persons participating either individually or in a group (joint venture / consortium) who fulfil the following criteria as stated in the Volume 1, Section 1. Instructions to Tenderers, General part, Clause 3: Participation and CEB Guidelines for procurement of supplies, works and services, Section 3.3: Eligibility to participate in tenders and provide supplies, works and services.
Tenderers are obliged to fulfil the following criteria:
a) Liquidity: the Tenderer must not have had any registered blockage of their account in the twelve (12) months preceding the day of publishing the Contract Procurement Notice.
In case of consortium: This provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.
b) Bankruptcy and liquidation: Tenderer is not in the proceedings of bankruptcy or liquidation, i.e. the previous bankruptcy proceedings.
In case of consortium: this provision applies to all members of the consortium and all subcontractors.

c) Operating income (in the event that the tender is submitted by an entrepreneur who keeps the books under the system of simple bookkeeping — income from business operations; in case the offer is submitted by a flat rate taxpayer — Activity income): Tenderer must have an average annual business revenue, during the previous 3 (three) accounting years (2014, 2015, 2016), not less than:
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — 50 667 EUR,
— for Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — 33 445,5 EUR,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 42 595,5 EUR,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 35 113,5 EUR,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 37 944 EUR,
— in euros at the middle exchange rate of the NBS on the last day of the reporting period.
If a Tenderer submits an offer for several lots, it must have an average operating income equal to the sum of the minimum business revenue for the lots for which the offer is submitted.
In case of consortium: 1 member of the consortium must fulfil at least 50% of the stated conditions.
2. Human resource capacity of the Tenderer:

a) The Tenderer must employ (on employment contract) at least below specified number of graduated engineers with a valid license issued by the Serbian Chamber of Engineers in case of submitting an offer:
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće i Požarevac — 4 persons,
— for Lot 6: Ub i Mionica — 2 persons,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 3 persons,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 3 persons,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 3 persons.
If a Tenderer submits the tender for several lots, it must show at least the sum of the minimum number of persons for the lots for which it is submitting a tender, being on employment contract.
In case of consortium: the criteria must be fulfilled by the consortium as a whole.
a) Experience in the provision of services:

That in the period from 1.1.2013 until the date of publication of the Contract Procurement Notice, had performed technical supervision services on the construction, reconstruction or upgrading of building structures* on the minimum of:
— for Lot 1: Niš — 5 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 2: Kruševac — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 3: Svilajnac, Žabari, Malo Crniće, Požarevac — 4 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 4: Loznica, Krupanj — 4 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 5: Sremska Mitrovica — 2 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 6: Ub, Mionica — 2 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 7: Temerin — 4 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 8: Zrenjanin — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 9: Novi Sad — total gross developed construction area 24.000 m2, on maximum 4 buildings,
— for Lot 10: Valjevo, Užice, Čajetina — 3 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 11: Novi Pazar — 1 500 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 12: Kikinda, Bački Petrovac, Bačka Palanka — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area,
— for Lot 13: Irig, Sremski Karlovci, Pančevo — 3 000 m2 total gross developed construction area.

If a Tenderer submits the tender for several lots, it must show, at least, the sum of required total gross developed construction area, in the period from 1.1.2013 until the publication date of the Contract Procurement Notice, for the lots for which it is submitting a tender.
In case of consortium: the criteria must be fulfilled by the consortium as a whole.
Name: Residential buildings with 2 or more apartments
Name: Residential building with 3 or more apartments
Name: Other buildings for short stay
Name: School buildings and scientific and research buildings
Name: Hospitals and other buildings for health care
* Building structures according to table defined in the Rulebook on classification of buildings, Official Gazette of RS, nº 22/2015
Selection procedure in the case of equal tender offers: In case of more Tenders with the same offered price the most favourable Tender shall be deemed the 1 with the longer Tender validity period.
In case of 2 Tenders with the same offered price and the same Tender validity period, the advantage is given to the Tenderer who offered a longer promissory note validity period.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Conditions for participation at the tender opening session:

TXT_MARK.P: Contracting Authority shall open the tenders publicly and tender opening session can be attended by any interested person, at time and place specified in this Procurement notice and Instructions to tenderers. In tender opening session, only the authorized tenderers' representatives can participate actively, in which case they are obliged to submit the authorization for attending and signing, as well as to sign the document by which they confirm their presence.
